argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ersym.1 | |- ( ph -> R Er X ) |
| 2 |  | ersym.2 | |- ( ph -> A R B ) |
| 3 |  | #P_errel | |- ( R Er X -> Rel R ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> Rel R ) |
| 5 |  | #P_brrelex12 | |- ( ( Rel R /\ A R B ) -> ( A e. _V /\ B e. _V ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 2, 5 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( A e. _V /\ B e. _V ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_brcnvg | |- ( ( B e. _V /\ A e. _V ) -> ( B `' R A <-> A R B ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( A e. _V /\ B e. _V ) -> ( B `' R A <-> A R B ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( B `' R A <-> A R B ) ) |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> B `' R A ) |
| 11 |  | #P_df-er | |- ( R Er X <-> ( Rel R /\ dom R = X /\ ( `' R u. ( R o. R ) ) C_ R ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_simp3bi | |- ( R Er X -> ( `' R u. ( R o. R ) ) C_ R ) |
| 13 | 1, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( `' R u. ( R o. R ) ) C_ R ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_unssad | |- ( ph -> `' R C_ R ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_ssbrd | |- ( ph -> ( B `' R A -> B R A ) ) |
| 16 | 10, 15 | #P_mpd | |- ( ph -> B R A ) |
